alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 4:31PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact the Montana Idaho border areas of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and south central Gallatin Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 428 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from near Lakeview to near Raynolds Pass, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Yellowstone, Targhee Pass, Raynolds Pass, Lakeview, Yellowstone Village and Red Rock Pass. This includes the following highways... Highway 191 between mile markers 5 and 10. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may also lead to minor localized flooding and debris flow down steep slopes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
